author: Nour Malas
title: Hawaii eruption destroys 9 homes — residents near Kilauea volcano are told to evacuate - MarketWatch
text:
Lava and toxic gases continued to spew in neighborhoods from Hawaii’s Kilauea volcano on Sunday, with 26 homes destroyed since the eruption began on Thursday and authorities ordering evacuations of 1,800 people.
A tweet on Sunday from the U.S. Geological Survey showed a lava fountain shooting 230 feet into the air in the Leilani Estates subdivision in the island’s east.
Authorities...
